channel.title: Help on an SRL function

item.title: Help on an SRL function
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Here, I kinda fixed it up so you get the point.
I hope I helped.

[php]program traderdropper;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/misc/trade.scar}

//const – didnt need this.
// x=‘true’;

//var; – if there are no variables, you do not need this.

procedure acceptit;
begin
AcceptTrade; // didnt need the true false, will accept a trade when
// it sees it.
end;

procedure drop;
begin
//use either of the 2:
//dropto(1,28); – will drop from the specified slot, to the other
//specified slot.
//dropall; – will drop everything.
end;

begin
setupsrl; //need this
repeat
acceptit;
until(tradescreen) or not(tradescreen) and not(loggedin)
if tradescreen then
begin
//blah blah what you want to go here
if not(tradescreen) and not(loggedin) then
begin
// blah blah what you want to go here
end;
end;
end.[/php]

Read full topic

item.title: Help on an SRL function
item.dc:creator: @r849f04n5937f423 r849f04n5937f423
item.description:
@r849f04n5937f423 wrote:

Im attempting to make a SCAR script that will accept the trade, and drop what it in the inventory after the trade. And then just sit and wait for another trade.
Right now i’m just playing with the different functions/procedures and when I try and compile this:

[code]program traderdropper;

{.include srl/srl/misc/trade.scar}

const;
x = ‘true’;

var;

procedure accept;
begin
AcceptTrade(x);
end;

begin
accept;
end.[/code]

It takes like 10-20 seconds to compile, writes back

Failed when compiling Line 215: [Error] (231:5): Unknown identifier 'bankscreen' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl/srl/misc/amount.scar User specified a new RS window

then goes accepts the trade. And im pretty sure im not using the boolean right. But i was just wondering if theres anything i should change that would make it compile faster and without errors.

Read full topic
